      • getElement

        public double getElement(int row,
                int col)
        Returns the element at the specified position in this matrix.
        Parameters:
        row - the row index of the element to return
        col - the column index of the element to return
        Returns:
        the element at the specified position
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the row or column index is out of range (row < 0 || row >= rows() || col < 0 || col >= cols())

      • setElement

        public void setElement(double value,
              int row,
              int col)
        Replaces the element at the specified position in this matrix with the specified element.
        Parameters:
        value - the element to be inserted at the specified position
        row - the row index of the element to replace
        col - the column index of the element to replace
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the row or column index is out of range (row < 0 || row >= rows() || col < 0 || col >= cols())
